TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OpenWriteCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 클래스의 인스턴스를 전달할 메서드.Instances of this class are passed to methods. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제 데이터 업로드를 쓸 스트림을 여는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code example demonstrates opening a stream to write data to be uploaded. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#16)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#16)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#16)] 다음 메서드는 스트림을 사용할 수 있는 경우 호출 됩니다.The following method is called when the stream is available. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As Stream
public: property System::IO::Stream ^ Result { System::IO::Stream ^ get(); };

summary.span: 서버에 데이터를 보내는 데 사용되는 쓰기 가능한 스트림을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets a writable stream that is used to send data to a server.

value.span: 업로드할 데이터를 쓸 수 있는 입니다.

span.span: A where you can write data to be uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 확인 해야 합니다 및 이 속성에 의해 반환 된 스트림을 사용 하기 전에 속성입니다.You should check the and properties before using the stream returned by this property. 경우는 속성의 값이를 개체 또는 속성의 값이 `true`, 비동기 작업이 제대로 완료 되지 않은 및 속성의 값을 유효 하지 않게 됩니다.If the property's value is an object or the property's value is `true`, the asynchronous operation did not complete correctly and the property's value will not be valid. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는이 속성에 의해 반환 된 스트림을 사용 합니다.The following code example uses the stream returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#15)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#15)]
